string-array.name: quiz_details
string-array.item: Which JetPack components category involves the following: 1.View Model 2.LiveData 3.Room 4.Navigation?,Behaviour,UI,Architecture,Foundation,Architecture
Some of Android features,Open Source,Compatibility,Technology Support,Both A and C,Both A and C
Is one of 3 key parts of the navigation component,Navigation drawer,NavHostFragment,Navigation args,All of the Above,NavHostFragment
Which of the following kernel is used in Android,Mac,Linux,Windows,Redhat,Linux
What does the .apk stands for?,Application Kernel,Android Phone Kit,Android Page Kit,Application Package,Application Package
Data classes cannot be,Abstract,Open,Sealed,All of the Above,All of the Above
Is one of the states of an Activity in Android,Foreground,onCreate,onStop,onStart,Foreground
For which of the following is Android mainly developed?,Desktops,Laptops,Mobile Devices,Servers,Mobile Devices
Which one is not a nickname of Android?,Donut,Muffin,Cupcake,Lollipop,Muffin
Android sizes fonts of mobile using ____ measurement,DP,SP,PX,PS,SP
The Java byte code is compiled into ____ when developing for the Android OS,Java Source Code,Dalvik Byte code,Dalvik Application Code,Kotlin Code,Dalvik Byte code
If permissions are missing the app will\n get this at runtime,Security Exception,NullPointerException,FileNotFoundException,ClassCastException,Security Exception
Sharing of data in Android is done via?,Data class,Service Content Provider,Activity,Broadcast,Service Content Provider
What does ADB stands for?,App Delete Bridge,App Destroy,Android Debug Bridge,Android Delete Bridge,Android Debug Bridge
